item.title: CephFS 구축하기
item.description: 1. CephFS Filesystem 생성 rook-ceph-filesystem.yaml apiVersion: ceph.rook.io/v1 kind: CephFilesystem metadata: name: rook-ceph-fs namespace: rook-ceph spec: metadataPool: replicated: size: 3 dataPools: - replicated: size: 3 preserveFilesystemOnDelete: true metadataServer: activeCount: 1 activeStandby: true metadataPool, dataPools 모두 replication 3개로 설정(3 OSD) MDS(Metadata Server)는 1 active + 1 standby (HA) 2.
